articles.title: US Defense Secretary to visit Philippines, Singapore, Vietnam - CNA
articles.description: WASHINGTON: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin will visit Southeast Asia later this month, the Pentagon said, in a trip that will include stops in the Philippines, Singapore and Vietnam, according to the US embassy in Hanoi.
